properties.description: This must be the first identifier in sequence in the form because under-the-bonnet processing associated with the mods to dublin core transform puts the PID in the first identifer element. If an identifier containing an isbn, doi or mfn is first, the data contained is overwritten.
properties.title: Internal ID

properties.description: Enter family name and first name (in full) here. If applicable choose author role (Author, Editor, Compiler) from drop down list.
properties.title: Personal Author

properties.description: If there is no personal author but the author is a corporate entity enter here, e.g. Environment Agency
properties.title: Corporate Author

properties.description: Enter title (and subtitle) of the book here.
properties.title: Book Title

properties.description: Enter the ISBN of the book here. Optional.
properties.title: ISBN

properties.description: If the book has a Digital object identifier (DOI), put here, e.g. 10.1007/1-4020-4466-6
properties.title: DOI

properties.description: Enter any extra annotation that may be required here, such as title of a special issue, e.g. "Special issue on management of tropical lakes".
properties.title: Note

properties.description: If the book is a new edition enter the number of the edition here, e.g. "3rd". Leave blank if first edition.
properties.title: Edition

properties.description: Enter Publisher name here, e.g. "Oxford University Press"
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description: Enter place of publication here, e.g. "London". If there are several places enter first or most relevant.
properties.title: Publication Place

properties.description: Indicate the "physical medium" or "support" on which the document is published by selecting one or more items from the drop down list.
properties.title: Physical Description

properties.description: Enter number of pages here, e.g. 252. If applicable add other after a semi-colon e.g. "153; + 3 figs" or "52; + 5 appendices"
properties.title: Pagination and additional pagination

properties.description: If the item has a shelfmark enter here, e.g. choose Windermere shelfmark and type "D3.542".
properties.title: Location

properties.description: Specify type of URL, e.g. "Publisher abstract" or "Full text pdf"
properties.title: URL Note

properties.description: If an abstract is supplied by the document please enter here.

Enter keywords to index the article (typically 3-7) from FBA Controlled Vocabulary. Browse the keyword display and then type in the first few letters of the term. Select the required term from the autocomplete list.
properties.title: Keywords
